definitions.title: conj.
definitions.body: and (BH [[וְ]]), used mostly as in Heb., except that there is no [[ו]] ‘consecutive’;—and, connecting both words (Da 2:5) and sentences (ib.). When three or more words are connected together, [[וְ]] may connect them all (Da 2:6, Da 2:10, Da 4:34, Da 5:18), or only the two last (Da 2:17, Da 3:4, Da 4:4, Ezr 6:9), or the three last (Da 2:37 Da 3:21), or be omitted altogether (Da 2:27, Da 5:11, cf. Da 3:2, Ezr 4:9). [[וְ]] also connects vbs., in cases where BH would use •[[וַ]], as Da 4:2, Da 5:29, Da 6:17, Da 6:25; in such cases a Pf. is oft. followed by a Ptcp., as Da 2:7 [[עֲנוֹוְאָֽמְרִין]], so v:Da 2:10, Da 3:9, Da 3:16, Da 3:24 +, hence in Da 2:5, Da 2:8, Da 2:15, Da 2:20 and often read prob. with Nö:GGA 1884, 1021 [[עֲנׇה וְאָמַר]] (for [[עָנֵה]]). Special senses:—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: and that Da 4:10, Da 4:12, Da 4:20, Ezr 6:8, Ezr 6:9 (cf. Da 2:16, Da 2:18); and also Da 6:29; = with, Da 7:1.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: connecting contrasted ideas, but Da 2:6, Da 3:6, Da 3:18, Da 4:4.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: = and so, Da 2:49, Da 6:2, esp. after imv. Da 2:4, Da 2:9, Da 2:24, or impf. Da 2:7.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: to express an intention Da 5:2 [[וְיִשְׁתּוֹן]] that they might drink: after a command, etc., even with ptcp. or perf., nearly = that, Da 2:13, Da 6:2 (cf. K:§ 102).

definitions.title: 5 c
definitions.body: ), Da 7:20 [[וְקִרְנׇא דִכֵּן וְעֵינַיִם לַהּ]] and this horn, it had eyes; but the case is isolated, and del, prob. [[וְ]] with Marti.
